newsitem.title: TAIWAN: Taiwan one-month NCDs yield average 6.385 pct.
newsitem.headline: Taiwan one-month NCDs yield average 6.385 pct.

text.p: Taiwan's central bank issued T$5 billion in one-month negotiable certificates of deposits on Thursday at an average yield of 6.385 percent, a central bank official said.
Bids ranged from 6.250 percent to 6.500 percent.
The central bank has said its recent series of NCD issues aimed to absorb extra money in the banking system but not to dampen stock market turnover as many analysts have asserted.
